title: League screen not working
body: Just before recent update my screen after you login appears black and has nothing on it this has been happening just before and during the latest update  on the screen I have the option to press play and to view my profile  I can also access the store although for  a while I wasn't able to. This has been  a slight hindrances  since I like to keep up to date. any information that can help is appreciated

replies.body: Who's your ISP and what OS are you on?
Alrighty, if anything like this happens again, get in contact with me.
